text: Kare koso wa anata gata o riku ni, mata umi ni tabi o sa se rareru okatadearu. Sorede anata gataga funeninoru-ji, sore ga jun kazeninotte koko sureba, kare-ra wa sore de yorokobu. Bofu ga osou to, onami ga yomo kara oshiyose, kare-ra wa mo kore madeda to kan'nen shite, arra ni mukatte, shinjin o tsukushite inoru. `Anata ga, moshi watashi-tachi o korekara sukui kudasareba, kanarazu kansha o sasageru mono ni narimasu
